akn:section.akn:heading: Substantial changes in operation must be approved.

akn:content.akn:p: Before a licensee may make a change in the interior or exterior, or a change in format, of any licensed establishment, which would substantially change the nature of the operation of the licensed establishment as set forth in the initial application for the license, the licensee shall obtain the approval of the Board in accordance with ยง 25-404.

A temporary or permanent reduction in the hours of operation of a licensed establishment shall not constitute a substantial change.
